  DOWN: 13,
  LEFT: 14,
  RIGHT: 15,
  MENU: 16,
  A: 0,
  B: 1,
  X: 2,
  Y: 3,
  LB: 4,
  RB: 5,
  LT: 6,
  RT: 7,
  BACK: 8,
  START: 9,
  LS: 10,
  RS: 11,
  LEFT_STICK_H: 0,
  LEFT_STICK_V: 1,
  RIGHT_STICK_H: 2,
  RIGHT_STICK_V: 3
};
